## PlayerEventPayloads."PLAYER.REQUEST\_SYNC" property

Emitted when a player's client requests a round trip time synchronization.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerEvent.REQUEST_SYNC]: {
        player: Player;
        receivedAt: number;
        receivedAtMs: number;
    };
```
